title: Collaborative Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program for In-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital tools and language education
context.additional_context: A process for advanced language education professionals in managerial/leadership roles to enhance technology integration competencies through collaborative instructional design in asynchronous online environments.

learning_goals: Learners develop three or more language lesson designs incorporating Web 2.0 tools using a collaborative instructional design process.
Learners evaluate the effectiveness of technology-integrated instructional activities at ≥80% using the TPACK (Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge) framework.
Learners produce an instructional design portfolio incorporating peer feedback to improve technology integration self-efficacy by ≥20%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
